text:
Chris Cuomo, in Day 2 of having the coronavirus, tells his hallucination dream where brother Governor Cuomo is wearing a ballet outfit, waving a wand and dancing away.

These guys give me life! 
🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 https://t.co/4sWq5PbPQ1
